channel.title: Need help setting up Server
channel.description:
I downloaded a source and client for my server. I have the JDK and i wanted to see if the server would run before i portforwarded it etc. I click run or compile and the black screen appears then dissapears. I did some research and it appears i have the wrong coding. I open up the source with winzip, click edit run with notepad, paste the correct coding then hit save then exit. It still dosent work and when i hit edit again the first coding is still there.
Can someone please help I really want to figure out whats going on.
